details:
btrfs: fix match incorrectly in dev_args_match_device

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.15.79 by commit c9fe4719c662e0af17eea723cf345e37719fd3c9, it was introduced in version v5.15.54 by commit 5578b681fbf2b22d61189a2539efd3009518b328. For more details please see the references link.
